landing.title: Meet Your Git Companion
landing.subtitle: ComitChu is a developer-focused service that turns your GitHub activity into a growing character.As you make more commits, your character evolves and collects badges, turning your coding journey into a visual experience.

choose.title: Choose Your Pet
choose.desc: Select from various adorable characters to be your coding companion

grow.title: Grow Together
grow.desc: Your pet gains XP and levels up as you make commits to your repositories

show.title: Show Off
show.desc: Display your pet's progress with beautiful SVG badges in your README
